description: This file contains CRUD functions for managing user data and saved recipes in a database, utilizing SQLAlchemy ORM. It includes functions for creating users, fetching users by email, listing saved recipes, upserting saved recipes, and removing saved recipes.

methods.name: str _hash_password_stub(plain_password: str)
methods.description: A stub function for hashing passwords, currently insecure and for temporary use only.

methods.name: Optional[models.User] get_user_by_email(db: Session, email: str)
methods.description: Fetches a user object from the database by email address.

methods.name: models.User create_user(db: Session, user_in: schemas.UserCreate)
methods.description: Creates a new user with a hashed password, raising an error if the email already exists.

methods.name: List[models.SavedRecipe] list_saved(db: Session, user_id: int)
methods.description: Returns a list of saved recipes for a specific user.

methods.name: models.SavedRecipe upsert_saved(db: Session, user_id: int, data: schemas.SavedRecipeCreate)
methods.description: Inserts a new saved recipe or updates an existing one for a user, with handling for race conditions.

methods.name: bool remove_saved(db: Session, user_id: int, recipe_id: int)
methods.description: Deletes a saved recipe for a user; returns True if deletion occurred.

ctags.name: remove_saved
ctags.pattern: /^def remove_saved(db: Session, user_id: int, recipe_id: int) -> bool:$/

ctags.name: upsert_saved
ctags.pattern: /^def upsert_saved(db: Session, user_id: int, data: schemas.SavedRecipeCreate) -> models.SavedReci/
